titles.title: A joint resolution designating the week beginning April 10, 1988, as "National Medical Laboratory Week".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 2/16/1988--Introduced. Designates the week beginning April 10, 1988, as National Medical Laboratory Week.
